name: AAC Technologies Holdings
overview:
Founded in 1993, AAC is one of the world’s foremost vertically integrated manufacturers of micro components. We combine integrated technology, design, and manufacturing to assure our customers get the highest quality products at competitive prices. As a total solutions provider, we have extensive experience and expertise in designing and manufacturing a diverse range of components, including acoustics, antennas, optics, haptics, and Li-ion polymer batteries for mobile devices. We are a virtual “One Stop Shop”.

Our products are used in a variety of applications including mobile handsets, tablets, notebooks, LED TV, game consoles, eReaders, MP3 players, MP4 players, and many other consumer electronics. We offer wide-ranging, innovative technology design solutions, covering mobile telecommunications, IT products, consumer electronics, home appliances, automobile applications, and medical applications.
